item.description:
If you write a book, is it your property in perpetuity? Can you control how and when it is distributed? What about a software program? Rand said that without property rights, no other rights are possible. Let's reexamine that assertion. Is copyright really a property right or just a means of suppressing the free speech rights of others? Our presenter, Gavin, will represent his understanding of the Free Software Foundation's viewpoint on this topic.

When: Sunday, April 19th, 11am
Where: White Horse Tavern, 116 Brighton Ave. Allston, MA
Why: Because bacon makes everything better
What: RSVP so we may reserve a spot for you

The food costs money, but the conversation is free.

group.name: The Boston Ayn Rand Meetup Group

item.name: April Meetup
